fields.description:
We need to update the Facebook SDK Module version.

It's more than 1 year old now as per https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_modules/blob/master/facebook/mobile/ios/Classes/FBConnect/version we are currently stuck on version 3.1 of the Facebook SDK... And there were a lot of improvements since them...

The official Changelog from 3.1 to 3.8:
https://developers.facebook.com/docs/ios/change-log-3.x/

There are many features and improvements since them, not to mention that the latest 3.8 version brings the UI enhancements necessary for iOS 7.
fields.summary: iOS: Update Facebook Module to version 3.8

comments.body: No need to create a duplicate ticket. I've linked this to the duplicate.
